name: HappySoaps Aloe vera shaving bar
composition: Ingredients: Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Aqua, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Glycerin, Parfum, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Glycine Soja Oil / Aloe Babadensis Leaf Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Tocopherol / Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha Isomethyl Ionon, Linalool.
